text: Metropolitan (French: Métropolitain) is a 1939 French thriller film directed by Maurice Cam and starring Albert Préjean, Ginette Leclerc and André Brulé. The film was remade in Britain the following year as A Window in London with the setting moved to the London Underground.Hodgson p.37 ==Synopsis== While travelling on the Paris Métro, a man spots what looks like a murder being committed. ==Cast== * Albert Préjean as Pierre * Ginette Leclerc as Viviane * André Brulé as Zoltini * Anne Laurens as Suzanne * Albert Duvaleix * Maxime Fabert * Pierre Sergeol * Paul Demange * Georgette Tissier * Yvonne Yma == References == ==Bibliography== * Hodgson, Michael. Patricia Roc. title: Metropolitan (1939 film)
